actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Standing Rules of the Senate to establish a point of order against consideration of any measure containing a provision increasing the pay of Senators unless the Congress has passed a balanced budget.

summary.text: Amends the Standing Rules of the Senate to establish a point of order against the consideration of a measure to increase the pay of Senators, the President pro tempore of the Senate, or the majority and minority leaders of the Senate unless the Committee on the Budget has determined that the most recent Federal budget passed by the Congress will be balanced for the applicable fiscal year.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Standing Rules of the Senate to establish a point of order against consideration of any measure containing a provision increasing the pay of Senators unless the Congress has passed a balanced budget.
